media:group.media:title: Chinese vs. American Political Philosophy
media:group.media:description:
Comparing the general political philosophies of China and America, focusing primarily on China. 

If you want to support the channel, here are the best ways to do it:

1) Watch the full video
2) Subscribe if you haven't
3) Share with a friend
4) Support me with a small donation on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rchapman 

0:00 Intro
01:47 The Basics
05:29 Confucianism
08:02 The CCP
10:52 The Left and the Right
13:33 Linear vs. Lateral Thinking
22:19 War
23:57 Outro

Sources:

The Analects - Confucius
The Art Of War - Sun Tzu
The Governance Of China - Xi Jinping
The Selected Works Of Mao Zedong - Mao Zedong
On China - Henry Kissinger
The American Political Tradition - Richard Hofstadter
China In The 21st Century - Jeffrey Wasserstrom
The Party - Richard McGregor
Culture Hacks - Richard Conrad
Has China Won? - Kishore Mahbubani

Theme music: Double Soul - Unfinished Sympathy
